name: Space Brick Blast
description:
The classical and exciting bricks breaker game reborn with a story!

In this popular bricks breaker game, the bricks become aliens and attack!?

Let's go to a journey into space while repelling the impending enemy. Even if a huge enemy strikes, it can be defeated by the power of character skills!

Legends and Adventures await you in this expanding universe.

Well, let's go for a great adventure to discover the secrets of the universe!


◇◆◇◆o*ﾟﾟ*o*ﾟﾟ*o◇◆o*ﾟﾟ*o*ﾟﾟ*o◇◆◇◆

◎ Features of Space Brick Blast
● More than 300 levels! And it’s just a beginning.
● Let's collect a wide variety of characters with their aircraft.
● Each character has special skills.
● Get lots of items in the daily quest.
● Use items such as laser or meteor to clear the stage.
● Let's break through difficult stages with special items!
● At first this universe has 13 episodes. Look forward to unfolds story.

◇◆◇◆o*ﾟﾟ*o*ﾟﾟ*o◇◆o*ﾟﾟ*o*ﾟﾟ*o◇◆◇◆
